formattedAddress: 210 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 210 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Rafalin is professional, compassionate and a wonderful doctor. I was having an issue and he called me back immediately despite being extremely busy. His staff is very professional and efficient, I was able to make an appointment without any problem on very short notice.
I’m so glad I found Dr. Rafalin, he truly is the best doctor!

text.text:

originalText.text: This doctor wants your business but not the responsibility comes with it.  I saw Dr. Rafalin when I first got pregnant. One afternoon,  I saw a hint of blood in my urine and was not sure whether I should be concerned. I called Dr. Rafalin's office and the admin passed my reason of calling to him. The Dr. did not bother to talk to me,  or even ask the amin to ask me for any details.  He just told the admin to tell me to call 911. I called another doctor for a 2nd opinion. The other doctor asked me about details and told me that my situation was totally normal in early pregnancy. She also told me to go in her office next day for an exam.  Turned out I was fine. Comparing the two doctor's reaction, I have to say Dr. Rafalin 1. didn't care about me as a patient, 2. Is lack of knowledge to form the right opinion, 3. caused a lot of anxiety in a pregnant woman, 4. almost caused a pregnant woman to suffer through an unnecessary trip to the ER; and 5. He probably follows his lawer's advice to steer himself clear off any liabilities.  So if you think your preganancy would be 100% smooth,  Dr. Rafalin could be a good doctor for you. But if anything may go wrong during the 9 months, think how would Dr. Rafalin act according to his lawyers.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Rafalin for the last 14 years he saw me through the pregnancy of my 2nd child and has been a main stay in my life since. He is clear in his communication, easy to deal with, his staff is amazing very warm, make sure appointments stay on time and address any issues with insurance immediately. I am uncomfortable during my annuals, I just don't like them, he makes them very easy on me which I appreciate.  He has helped me through child birth, my annuals as well as cosmetic procedures. I highly recommend him!

originalText.text: It has been at least 6 years since I moved out of New York and saw Dr. Rafalin. I am about 3.5 hours away from the city and I am seriously considering making him my doctor again and taking a day off just to go see him. He was an amazing doctor. I have had 4 gyns these past 6 years and I do not think all of them combined have not spent as much time being concerned about me as Dr. Rafalin did in one appointment. He listened and he talked politely and professionally. He was warm and kind and I felt he really truly cared about my well being. Go see him.

originalText.text: Dr. Rafalin is a total rockstar in the delivery room. I had a great experience delivering my daughter with him. He is extremely knowledgeable and you always have a female nurse in the room during exams. His office staff are all nice and efficient, the nurses were very sweet. It's a smaller practice where they get to know their patients. His bedside manner is a little gruff which I liked but may not be everyone's preference.
